data.title: Which mount is better to buy as your first telescope: An EQ (Equatorial) mount or an AZ (Alt-Azimuth) mount?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 6): Great question! 

it looks like the preponderance of the answers are "alt azimuth."  And I get that.  But, then, as I am wont to do, I'm going to muddy the waters:

Before answering that question, I have three questions for you:

	How technically adept are you?
	What is your leve...
